ygData.subject: Re: BQ (Bards Quarterly) A few words about bards and fashion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehehe, my gf HATED that staff with a passion, and finally after using it for almost 20 levels off and on (mainly to get blunt skill up, never really as a
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>In truth many people do I would think. Only recently I gave up the
>dragoon dirk/combine rapier combo for a dirk/polished granite tomahawk.
>As vain as I may sound I prefer the dirk/rapier look. I just need the
>tomahawk since I usually end up being the tank in my party. Having seen
>a staff of writhing I absolutely refuse to wield one. What would the
>ladies think of you while using one? <grin>
>
>Treilanin Loreweaver
>Honour Guard, Karana

Hehehe, my gf HATED that staff with a passion, and finally after using it
for almost 20 levels off and on (mainly to get blunt skill up, never really
as a main weapon) i sold it off, much to her delight. I called it the Ugly
Stick, cuz - well it IS ugly IMHO.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 38th Chorus
Veeshan
